sections: ## Uncategorized (root docs/ .md files not in subdirs)

section_8_orphaned_subagents.principle: All subagents not referenced by any command should be suggested for deletion or archival
section_8_orphaned_subagents.detection_logic: For each agents/*.md: grep -r 'Task.*subagent_type.*<agent-name>' commands/ || grep -r '<agent-name>' commands/*.md. If not found → orphaned

section_9_unreferenced_scripts.principle: All scripts not referenced by commands or subagents should be suggested for deletion
section_9_unreferenced_scripts.detection_logic: For each scripts/*.sh: check-file-references.sh + grep in commands/*.md and agents/*.md. If no functional references → unreferenced

section_10_orphaned_tests.principle: All tests for non-existent code should be suggested for deletion
section_10_orphaned_tests.detection_logic: For each tests/test_*.py: extract module name, check if src/<module>.py or scripts/<module>.sh exists. If not → orphaned

section_11_historical_feature_docs.principle: Docs describing deleted features should be archived
section_11_historical_feature_docs.detection_logic: For docs/*.md: extract feature/module names from content, check if corresponding code exists. If not → historical

section_12_docs_categorization.principle: All docs should be categorized into standard subdirectories
section_12_docs_categorization.detection_logic: For each docs/*.md (excluding INDEX.md, dev/, clean/): match filename against patterns, suggest target subdirectory
